description: Technicians and administrators alike need tools to diagnose computer problems, centrally manage encryption and recovery keys, provide consistency in user settings, provide application co-existence and more. These are some of the topics that we will tackle in our series on MDOP.
name: Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack
subtitle: MDOP

episodes.description: Technicians and administrators alike need tools to diagnose computer problems, centrally manage encryption and recovery keys, provide consistency in user settings, provide application co-existence and more. These are some of the topics that we will tackle in our series on MDOP.
episodes.title: Overview

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes begin their Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack Series by exploring Bitlocker Admin and Monitoring components. This includes the Domain Controller, Management Workstations, Database Server, Administration and Monitoring Server, and MBAM Client.
episodes.title: MBAM Components

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes explain the preplanning steps necessary for the Microsoft Active Directory to work with Bitlocker Administration and Monitoring services. They will look at the user accounts and group roles used to manage the MBAM system. Finally they discuss the Group Policy templates that are downloaded and added for MBAM.
episodes.title: Preparing ADDS for MBAM

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes take you through the installation of the MBAM utility. They begin by explaining the prerequisites that will need to be installed before the MBAM installation can begin. This includes IIS web server service as well as SQL server and ASP .NET frameworks. Finally they are able to walk you through each step to getting MBAM installed.
episodes.title: Installing MBAM

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes show you how to deploy and configure MBAM. They start by getting the client installed on a desktop workstation running Windows 10. Then they go back to the server and configure all the necessary settings through Group Policy. They also walk you through all the GPO settings for MBAM, explaining them as they go.
episodes.title: Deploying and Configuring MBAM

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes explore the actual administration and recovery of end devices using the MBAM administration console. They start by looking at the End User experience. Then they look at the Compliance and Auditing features. Finally, they demonstrate and actual recovery of a client machine.
episodes.title: Administering and Recovery

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes explore the handy tool from Microsoft known as the Diagnostic and Recovery Toolset. They start by explaining what the DaRT is and walk you through setting up the prerequisites for its installation. Then they demonstrate the install of the DaRT system.
episodes.title: Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes continue their look at the Diagnostic and Recovery Toolset. In the previous episode they got it successfully installed, so here they show you how to create a DaRT image and use the DaRT system to remotely access a client PC. They also demonstrate all the tools that come bundled with DaRT.
episodes.title: Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset Part 2

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes explore application virtualization with Microsoft's AppV software. Here they explain the concept of application virtualization and the prerequisites for installing the AppV Sequencer. Then they sequence a software program for the purposes of virtualizing on a client computer.
episodes.title: Application Virtualization

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes continue their discussion on Microsoft's AppV. They jump back in by demonstrating the installation of the AppV client and then running the previously sequenced software along side an older version. Finally they look at editing AppV packages and the settings therein.
episodes.title: Application Virtualization Part 2

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes introduce you to MDOP's User Experience Virtualization. They begin by describing what UE-V is as well as its similarities and differences to Folder Redirection and/or Roaming Profile. Then they explain all the components of the UE-V system and then move to preparing the environment for the UE-V deployment.
episodes.title: User Experience Virtualization

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes continue demonstrating how to deploy the User Experience Virtualization system. Here they pick up by showing you step-by-step how to install the UE-V Generator. Then they create customized settings location templates. Finally, they configure the UE-V Group Policy settings.
episodes.title: User Experience Virtualization Part 2

episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Wes finish demonstrating how to deploy the User Experience Virtualization system. Here they prepare the client computer by installing the UE-V agent. Then they test the UE-V system by changing some settings and checking their persistence. Finally they open up the Company Settings Center and look at the options available there.
episodes.title: User Experience Virtualization Part 3
